item.title: Ogles and other Republicans push federal ban on chemical abortions
item.description: Rep. Andy Ogles and more than a dozen House Republicans push proposal to ban chemical abortions. The proposal was first put forward in 2023.

item.title: Former Atlanta mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms mulling Georgia gubernatorial run
item.description: Former Atlanta mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms said she is considering running in Georgia's 2026 gubernatorial election. She last served in the Biden admin...

item.title: Trumps claims military entered California to release water flow, but state says that did not happen
item.description: President Donald Trump claimed that the military entered California and turned on the water, but state water officials say the president's claim is fa...

item.title: Freshman GOP lawmaker rallies behind Trump's rapid illegal immigration crackdown: 'No time to waste'
item.description: GOP Rep. Abe Hamadeh told Fox News Digital that Trump "learned a lot" from 2017 and expects the president to continue to move fast enacting his agenda...

item.title: Trump transportation secretary pick Sean Duffy to face Senate confirmation vote
item.description: The Senate to hold a vote on Tuesday on whether to confirm President Donald Trump's transportation secretary nominee, Sean Duffy.
